headline: Jim Cramer on Martin Marietta: “Just Hold it. I Wouldn’t Buy More”
summary: Martin Marietta Materials, Inc. (NYSE:MLM) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently offered insights on. A caller, who began buying MLM shares before a recent rally, noted the stock hit a 52-week high, and despite a pullback, they are up 36% and asked what they should do with their position. Cramer stated: “Just hold […]
